result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (1st w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old) and Operating w/ PAC-Passenger < 16 Yrs, PAC>=0.08, <0.15 (1st). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (1st w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC-Passenger < 16 Yrs, PAC>=0.08, <0.15 (1st) was dismissed by the court.

  • Michael Russel Henry was found guilty of OWI (1st w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The fine is $1242.00 due 60 days or pay plan.

County blood draw costs of $65.00 due 60 days or pay plan.

DNA surcharge of $200.00 due 60 days or pay plan.

Submit DNA sample.
Huber privileges subject to jail policies.
and comply with all treatment recommendations.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael Russel Henry in court with attorney Richard Bert Jacobson.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to OAR with child. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence: 10 days jail starting Aug. 18, 2016 at 7 p.m. Huber granted under jail rules. $65 blood draw fee. $1,442 fine, 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. 13 month revocation, 13 month IID.   Submit DNA sample. 2 days jail credit. Counts  2&3 dismissed.

Defendant Michael Russel Henry in court with attorney Richard B. Jacobson.  Clifford Chase Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Jacobson requesting reset,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 11, 2016 at 02:50 pm.  Return date scheduled for July 27, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Michael Russel Henry in court with attorney Richard B. Jacobson.  Christine Marie Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Jacobson requesting reset, bond cont'd  Return date scheduled for May 11, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
